newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Stratus Computer raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Stratus Computer raised.

text.p: -- Cowen & Co said analyst Steve Weber upgraded Stratus Computer Inc to strong buy from neutral.
-- raised the 1997 estimate by $0.75 per share to $3.15, and upped the 1998 estimate by $0.85 to $3.70.
